RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 85. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $12,500. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONEMORETIMEAROUND broke back, a bit keen past the wire the first time, settled off the pace and the inside, advanced into contention three wide in the second turn, challenged on the outside entering the stretch, put a head in front when straightened for home, cleared while drifting in slightly then held the runner up safe late. MERCI in the second flight, saved ground second turn, behind traffic late in that bend, steered out for room approaching midstretch, finished up willingly to be getting to the winner late. MONARCH MAN forwardly placed off the rail, moved to challenge between foes entering the stretch, not enough in the late going for the top two while holding the show spot. ZULTAN broke on top, set the pace inside, briefly responded when confronted entering the straight then began to falter when headed soon after. TIZ THE BIG ONE pressured the leader for five furlongs and had little left for when the real running began turning for home. BONUS APPRECIATION went one paced in lacking a closing kick. VALIANT DEFENDER void of early foot, picked off a couple of tiring rivals while never a threat. TENOR raced in mid pack for six furlongs, weakened through the stretch. YOUR TIME'S COMING had nothing for the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Valiant Defender
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early foot, picked off a couple of tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Zultan
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, set the pace, weakened when headed into lane

ENTRY.NAME: Merci
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, behind traffic 1/4, rail 2nd turn, steered out,coming

ENTRY.NAME: Tenor
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack for six furlongs, weakened stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Bonus Appreciation
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced in lacking a closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: Your Time's Coming
ENTRY.COMMENT: had nothing for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Onemoretimearound
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, keen early,3w advance 2nd turn,outside bid, held late

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz the Big One
ENTRY.OWNER: Flying B Ranch Cattle Company LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, little left for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Monarch Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed off rail, bid btwn into lane, not enuf late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHADY STAR broke in mid pack, moved up to press the issue into the turn, dueled into the stretch, took over, well clear inside the furlong marker, enough left to hold sway. LOST GOLD moved up to race in the second flight along the inside up the backstretch, moved out then idled through the turn, set down for the drive, late rally in the three path to finish up willingly. ONE MORE SLEEP pressed the issue along the inside for a half, fell back off the winner by late in the turn, finished up best of the rest. ALWAYS LOGAN broke alertly from the outside, showed the way out of the chute, continued to hold the advantage between foes far turn, dueled into the lane then faltered nearing midstretch. SHOETRICK turned in an even effort throughout. MY UNCLE BILLY remained back in failing to rally. BASTI BLUE last away, trailed throughout and was never a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: One More Sleep
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, gradually weakened, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Lost Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up,2nd flight inside,moved out, idled turn, rallied outside

ENTRY.NAME: Shoetrick
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout in lacking a closing bid

ENTRY.NAME: Shady Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in mid pack, moved up to press turn, shook clear,held

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Rusty Brown & Debi Brown, Victor Flores

ENTRY.NAME: Basti Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: My Uncle Billy
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Always Logan
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly outside, paced, faltered in the drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 5F Turf CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 14000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $12,500. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEET SASSICAIA tracked the two leaders just off the inside, continued to pursue that pair through the turn and into the stretch, late surge to power by. KISS UPON A STAR back off the pace and the inside, rallied on the outside and was also going well at the end. RUN AWAY SAMARI broke alertly,. dueled up front closest to the inside, continued to alternate into the lane, shook clear with a furlong to run, proved no match for the top two late. ELLA'S BABY void of speed, continued to race back through the turn while saving ground, displayed some mild late interest the final furlong to improve position. BOSTON PAULETTE broke back, trailed in the two path, also improved position a bit while not a serious late threat. NATURALBORNSENDER dueled up front in the two path, gave way stretch. VEGAS ON MY MIND came in at the start, mid pack early, began a steady fade before three furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Run Away Samari
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, dueled up front inside, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Ella's Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, saved ground turn, mild interest thru traffic

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Sassicaia
ENTRY.COMMENT: track 2 leaders, late surge, bid, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Boston Paulette
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, trailed, improved slightly, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Naturalbornsender
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2p, gave way stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Vegas On My Mind
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in start, steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss Upon a Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace,outside rally, willingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 36000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 15, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Sin ce May 15, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NOSY BANKER in the second flight while racing outside, ranged up to challenge three wide and between horses turning for home, dueled the final furlong, dug in late to prevail in game fashion. OAK HILL LG broke out, raced back early in lacking speed, moved up four wide to challenge entering the stretch, put a head in front past the furlong marker, dueled to the wire outside the winner, outgamed in the late going. GUITAR TRIBUTE hesitated at the break to spot the field a couple of lengths, continued to trail, came widest for the drive, staged a rally toward the center of the strip to be in time for the show. JEB'S LUCKY EIGHT in the main body early, closer after a half, challenged inside the pacesetter midway on the final turn, failed to sustain that advance through the stretch. CALIBRACHOA KID moved up to take command after the start, set the early pace well out in the strip, continued to show the way in the three path far turn, weakened when headed in upper stretch. KAJUN KARMA within striking distance early, moved closer while being asked along the rail midway on the final turn, steadied while unable to keep up with a quarter to run and fell back. FLASHING ANGELBABY settled in mid pack, had nothing for the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Calibrachoa Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to take command, pace 3p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Flashing Angelbaby
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled in mid pack, nothing left for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Oak Hill Lg
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, lacked speed, 4w bid into lane, led, outgamed late

ENTRY.NAME: Guitar Tribute
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated break, trailed, came widest drive, rallied show

ENTRY.NAME: Kajun Karma
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, asked 2nd inside,steadied 1/4,fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Nosy Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, 3w bid into lane, late duel, determined

ENTRY.NAME: Jeb's Lucky Eight
ENTRY.COMMENT: closer after half, inside bid, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 73. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HARDLY ABLE prompted the issue up front in the run up the backstretch well out in the strip, challenged four wide and between horses turning for home, gained a slight advantage approaching midstretch and powered clear. ANGELIC KNIGHT broke in to bother POPPA MAGIC causing that one to steady, was straightened to race off the pace well wide, ranged up five wide to vie for the lead entering the stretch, could not match strides with the winner the final furlong, clearly second best. APRIORITY AVENGER back off the pace outside, loomed a threat when fanned six wide into the lane, stalled a bit in upper stretch, finished a determined third late while not a threat to the top two. I'M A NIGHT TRAIN pressed early in the three path, vied while remaining three wide and between foes exiting the turn, briefly raced on equal terms with the winner past the furlong marker, weakened late to lose a couple of positions. POPPA MAGIC bothered and forced to steady at the break, void of speed for a half as a result, staged a late rally to improve position late. VALLEY MISCHIEF set or forced the pace for a half while between foes and weakened. PARKER NOW narrowly set the pace along the inside, gave way in the drive. HEZA SEXY ZONG remained back in failing to threaten. RED IDOL finished early. INGLIS tired while racing inside.

ENTRY.NAME: Heza Sexy Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to threat

ENTRY.NAME: Parker Now
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: narrowly set pace inside, gave way drive

ENTRY.NAME: Valley Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace between foes, weakened drive

ENTRY.NAME: Inglis
ENTRY.COMMENT: tired inside

ENTRY.NAME: I'm a Night Train
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early 3w, vied turn btwn foes, weakened, caught 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Hardly Able
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace well wide, 4w bid btwn into lane, powered clear

ENTRY.NAME: Poppa Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered, steadied start, void of speed, late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Angelic Knight
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bothered foe, mid pace, 5w bid into lane, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Apriority Avenger
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, fanned 6w, bid into lane, determined 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Red Idol
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 5F Turf CR: 77. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 15, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Rac e Since May 15, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOR REAL ALICE behind the early pace inside, asked midturn, accelerated and knifed between horses to challenge into the lane, dueled upper stretch, kicked clear under steady handling. SUMMERJUSTBET HER with the pace early closest to the inside, garnered a slightly larger advantage late in the turn, responded when challenged by the winner soon after, raced on equal terms with that one past the furlong marker then could not keep up, all out to save the place. TAPIT RIGHT broke back, outrun while along the inside, continued to save ground into and through the turn, rallied up the inside through the straight to be getting to the runner up late. TAY TAY'S BABY back off the pace and the inside, displayed some mild late interest from between horses, not enough for the show. AMARDINE off a step slow, void of speed for three furlongs, improved position up the rail to improve position. HARRIET'S DREAM in mid pack and off the inside, came four wide out of the turn, went evenly to the wire in lacking a significant late kick. CHARLIE'S PEAK vied up front three wide for three furlongs, weakened entering the stretch. WENDY WILECAT off a step slow, raced in the main body early, began to tire before three furlongs. CONDESA'S HANDMAID with the early pace while between horses and outside the runner up, gave way turning for home.

ENTRY.NAME: Tapit Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed inside, rail rally, gaining 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: For Real Alice
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind pace, knifed thru btwn foes 1/4,duel, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Harriet's Dream
ENTRY.OWNER: World War IV Racing and Rebel Tide Racing, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack and off rail, 4w into lane, evenly to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Tay Tay's Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, mild interest, not enough for the show

ENTRY.NAME: Wendy Wilecat
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, weakened through the lane

ENTRY.NAME: Summerjustbet Her
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace closest to inside, dueled upper, saved 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Amardine
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, trailed, late interest up rail

ENTRY.NAME: Condesa's Handmaid
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace btwn foes, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Charlie's Peak
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early three wide, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 100. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 15, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Race s Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIKE J with the pace from the start, dueled up the backstretch off the inside, disposed of the other speed late in the turn to be clear into the lane, extended that advantage past the furlong marker then had enough late to hold off the runner up. JAX MAN in the second flight early while outside, three wide into the stretch, chased the winner past the furlong marker then was steadily getting to that one late under brisk handling. DRIFTER last away, raced back early, angled out to be four wide into the lane, finished up willingly to be closing the gap on both of the top two. MISCHIEF'S MACHINE broke inward and a bit slowly, void of speed up the backstretch, five wide and between horses exiting the turn, improved position without posing a threat to the top three. BINDING AGREEMENT shuffled back toward the inside exiting the chute, remained back, fanned six wide turning into the stretch, bettered position a bit. LIFE IS A BANQUET broke on top, alternated up front for over a half while inside the winner, first to blink. ALEXIS S in the second flight along the inside, came up empty for the stretch run. CREOLE CHARLIE in mid pack and four wide through the turn, tired through the stretch. UNCLE FRANK in the second group early, began a steady retreat before a half. CANADIAN PRIDE was finished early, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Alexis S
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight inside, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Binding Agreement
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back out of chute, trailed, fanned 6w into lane,improved

ENTRY.NAME: Drifter
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, raced back, angled 4w into lane, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Life Is a Banquet
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, dueled up front inside winner, 1st to blink

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Frank
ENTRY.COMMENT: staged a steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Canadian Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, trailed home

ENTRY.NAME: Mischief's Machine
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in a bit slow, lacked speed, 5w into lane,improved

ENTRY.NAME: Creole Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack and 4w turn, tired drive

ENTRY.NAME: Jax Man
ENTRY.OWNER: Alston Thoroughbreds LLC Hernandez E Hernandez K and Duvieilh J
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, three wide into the lane, closing gap

ENTRY.NAME: Mike J
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front off rail, shook clear, enough left late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5F Turf CR: 90. Allowance Purse 31000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Allowed 3 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISTER CHAIRMAN closest to the leader, engaged that one to duel into the turn, floated out as a result of the loose horse inside, continued to duel into the lane, shook clear with less than a furlong remaining, held the runner up safe late. BUCK DOLL TAYLOR forwardly placed toward the inside, bothered by the loose horse into the turn, checked up in tight soon after, fell back, three wide into the lane, called on for run, closed well to be closing the gap on the winner. TAPISTAR forwardly placed off the inside, remained with striking distance into the stretch, lacked a winning kick. EMPIRE KID broke on top, cleared early, responded when the winner challenged into the turn, was carried out along with that one by a loose horse, regathered, dueled into the lane, began go weaken nearing the furlong grounds. RANGER REX bothered to be off a step slow, moved up to mid pack, altered course to the outside in some traffic into the turn, went evenly to the wire. F J'S FLACO off slow and bothered, raced back, saved ground to no avail through the turn in lacking a rally. CHARLIE'S CREED broke in to bother a couple of inner rivals, raced back, had little for the drive. HARPES HILL was never a factor. ZAVALA hopped dramatically at the break and unseated his rider. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE START, NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Empire Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, clear early, dueled, carried out 5/16,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: F J's Flaco
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, bothered, saved ground to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Ranger Rex
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered, off step slow, altered 3/8, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie's Creed
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bothered foes, little for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Buck Doll Taylor
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, bothered, checked 3/8, 3w rally, coming late

ENTRY.NAME: Mister Chairman
ENTRY.OWNER: Mazoch Linda Mazoch Michael J and Gustafson Austin
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to leader, floated out 5/16, dueled,clear, lasted late

ENTRY.NAME: Zavala
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped, unseated rider

ENTRY.NAME: Tapistar
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, lacked winning kick

ENTRY.NAME: Harpes Hill
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never a factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEY MADALYN CLAIRE pressed the issue up front in the two path up the backstretch, fell back off the leader into the turn, continued to chase that rival past the furlong marker, came again late to prove best while between the next two at the wire. SUMMER IS HOT fell back to trail, moved outside, five wide into the lane, rallied down the middle of the strip to be getting to the winner late. SERAPE broke on top, cleared to the inside, showed the way into the turn, clear into and through upper stretch, faltered late. HOT PATOOTIE back off the early pace after breaking with the leaders, chased the forward two into the lane, went flat to the wire to finish up evenly. MAGGIE'S RETURN went one paced throughout to also be found lacking in the late going. SUNSHINE STAR off a step slow, was used to move up into a forward position for a half, faded down the stretch. THE GREY BEAUTY broke out, raced in the second group outside, tired. ENOUGH HEART finished early, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Sunshine Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, moved up, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Summer Is Hot
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, moved out, 5w into lane, rallied,gaining late

ENTRY.NAME: Enough Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Maggie's Return
ENTRY.OWNER: Haas Margaret Lanetta and Womack Larry D
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout, lacked bid

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Patootie
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Madalyn Claire
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2p, fell back late turn, came again, determined

ENTRY.NAME: Serape
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, cleared to inside, larger lead, faltered late

ENTRY.NAME: The Grey Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, 2nd flight, tired
